function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Realtime monitoring of iaq parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on iot for realtime monitoring may lead to system failures, causing hazardous conditions to go undetected.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater interaction with the physical world through iot increases the risk of cyber attacks and unauthorized access to iaq monitoring systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on prediction systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low performance of non-iot based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges with sensor calibration and practical implementation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wsn based systems using zig-bee as the communication protocol","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High latency in wsn-based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iot based systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to volatile organic compounds vocs such as xylene, ethylbenzene, toluene, and benzene in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality iaq leading to potential health risks for residents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weaknesses in existing iaq monitoring systems leading to unreliable data and potential health risks for residents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of sensors without proper calibration could lead to inaccurate measurements of iaq parameters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper data transmission strategy may result in high power consumption and redundant network traffic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to reduce computational burden of sensing nodes may lead to shorter battery life of the monitoring system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-cost iaq monitor may have limited accuracy and reliability, leading to incorrect measurements of pollutants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and pollutant levels may go unnoticed due to limited monitoring parameters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on statistical analysis software ibm spss statistics for data analysis may introduce errors or biases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sensor nodes to measure gaseous pollutants may lead to potential contamination if not properly maintained.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of smart mobile standards, wsn, and other sensing technologies may introduce cybersecurity risks if not properly secured.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designing separate battery units for the sensor network introduces the risk of battery failure and data loss if not monitored effectively.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring for indoor air quality iaq parameters such as humidity, temperature, gaseous pollutants, and pm.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or delayed estimation of atmospheric changes and pollutants in indoor environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited or no access to real-time iaq monitoring and exposure risk updates for building occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper air quality monitoring leading to potential exposure to air contaminants and pollutants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality assessment leading to potential health risks from indoor pollutants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Usage of high integrity serial bus protocol can may lead to potential data breaches or security vulnerabilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of low-cost micro gas sensors and arduino microcontroller may result in inaccurate iaq monitoring and data quality issues.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless communication using zigbee module may introduce interference and communication disruptions in iaq monitoring system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to poor air quality monitoring and control system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on energy-saving performance validation test for system effectiveness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality iaq due to the presence of gases co2, vocs, so2, nox, co, pm, and ozone in different indoor settings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High power consumption of gas sensors used for iaq monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability and calibration issues with environmental settings and sensor characteristics for accurate iaq monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of diseases due to contaminated air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of air pollutants leading to improper management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased health issues due to indoor air pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate monitoring of iaq parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher concentration of vocs in buildings can lead to skin, throat, and respiratory irritation, as well as broader set of illnesses including headaches, fatigue, and respiratory symptoms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixture of pollutants in indoor air can generate secondary pollutants that are more harmful than the primary ones.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of biological agents in indoor air can degrade overall air quality and cause respiratory diseases and allergic sensitization.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of hazardous chemical pollutants such as vocs, co, and so2 in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ground-level ozone as a cause of respiratory health diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with high co2 concentration in indoor air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Routine exposure to non-liquid petroleum gas fuel linked to acute infections in the lower respiratory tract, including pneumonia and severe pneumonia.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of pollutants such as particle matter in urban indoor environments, with a large proportion of ultra-fine particles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excessive exposure to solid fuel increasing the number of deaths among children in the age group of 1 to 4","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Solid fuel reported as the most significant reason behind many cases of non-fatal pneumonia","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
